reviews.review_msg: Great class and professor in general. Very interesting subjects. He basically tells you stories the whole class time. You may find yourself taking a lot of notes down if you don't have a good memory. Readings are not mandatory. A fair to easy marker on essays. Very helpful and informative. I would definitely take another course with him.

Bad! Bad! Bad! Bad! Bad!  Arrogant, pompous (he wears wizard robes to class), and honestly he doesn't seem that bright.  He wrote the course textbook...seemingly in less time than this review is taking me to write.  That said, the class is fantastic despite him.

Great prof. He's to the point and if you follow his criteria you will do well. Tutorial isn't mandatory which is a plus! If you do the readings and have a logical flow when you write your papers, you will succeed.
the easiest prof in History. He is very knowledgable! You will regret if you don't take his class in SFU!
